books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the events surrounding the assassination of John F. Kennedy.
books.name: KILLING KENNEDY

books.author: by Stanley McChrystal
books.description: The former commander of U.S. forces in Afghanistan, now retired,  reviews his career.
books.name: MY SHARE OF THE TASK

books.author: by Mark Owen with Kevin Maurer
books.description: An account of the mission that killed Osama bin Laden, by a former member of the Navy SEALs, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: NO EASY DAY

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: KILLING LINCOLN

books.author: by Jon Meacham
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning biographer celebrates Jefferson’s skills as a practical politician.
books.name: THOMAS JEFFERSON

books.author: by Laura L. Schroff
books.description: The long friendship between a sales executive and a destitute boy.
books.name: AN INVISIBLE THREAD

books.author: by Doris Kearns Goodwin
books.description: The political genius of Abraham Lincoln, revealed in his relationship with his cabinet; originally published in 2005.
books.name: TEAM OF RIVALS

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Katherine Boo
books.description: A journalist reports on families striving for better lives in a Mumbai slum.
books.name: BEHIND THE BEAUTIFUL FOREVERS

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Jeff Bridges and Bernie Glassman
books.description: The actor and the Zen master, longtime friends, examine the wisdom of Bridges’s character the Dude from the 1998 cult classic “The Big Lebowski.”
books.name: THE DUDE AND THE ZEN MASTER

books.author: by Charles Duhigg
books.description: A Times reporter’s account of the science behind how we form, and break, habits.
books.name: THE POWER OF HABIT

books.author: by Adam Makos with Larry Alexander
books.description: An encounter between an American and a German pilot in the skies over Germany in December 1943.
books.name: A HIGHER CALL

books.author: by Jared Diamond
books.description: The author of “Guns, Germs, and Steel” examines what we can learn from traditional societies.
books.name: THE WORLD UNTIL YESTERDAY
